text: My servant, you must walk the subtle path of deceit. These pawns have served their purpose in the great design of Fate. End them and the reward you deserve but do not crave shall be yours…
Time has come to enact the will of Fate, my servant. Grant change and oblivion to the multitudes; do this and my gifts shall be yours to use as you will…

Mortals cling to the futile concepts of permanence and stability, but the only constant in the universe is change. Show them the error of their ways; rain the fires of Fate upon their homes so that they might know the one Truth. Enact my will and your deserved reward shall be yours…
